positive_examples: This is an example of core game.
The core game demonstrated clear characteristics.
We observed core game in this context.
A typical case of core game would involve these features.
The concept of core game applies here.
A cooperative game analyzed using the core solution concept where no coalition has incentive to deviate.
negative_examples: This is an example of evolutionary game, not core game.
This represents cooperative game in general.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: EvolutionaryGame, or other types of CooperativeGame

definition: A cooperative game theory solution concept based on stable coalition allocations.
